title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7332.8 - Grievance coordinator responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7332.8 - Grievance coordinator responsibilities

State Regulations
(a) The grievance coordinator shall act as a
liaison between the grievant, the director and the Commission in all matters
that pertain to the youth grievance program. (b) The chairperson of the Citizen's Policy
and Complaint Review Council may direct a facility's grievance coordinator to
provide a paper copy of the written determination to the grievant, if still
incarcerated in the facility, within one business day of receipt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7332.8

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
